Hello !
I have a problem , I want to create a xls inserting data one by one , pick up a thing , open the xls and insert lame other data, open and put it back the next data ..

Now what I do is put all the variables in an array, and then I put this direct array in xls, but I get error memory limit ... then I want to be putting these variables one by one ...

please help

sory for my bad english.
  1. when you looping the iteration, save cell number into array with cell which you want to update the value,
  2. after looping, then lopping array then set value with new value which have the cell number you saved before
  3. use phpexcel to write again from existing loaded to new file
i hope you understand what i'm saying
